name: ComparatorPredicateTest
description: Unit tests for the ComparatorPredicate class, which tests various comparison criteria using a custom comparator.

nested_classes.name: TestComparator
nested_classes.description: Internal comparator class used for testing.

test_cases.name: testCompareEquals
test_cases.description: Tests the equality comparison functionality of the ComparatorPredicate.

test_cases.name: testCompareGreater
test_cases.description: Tests the greater than comparison functionality of the ComparatorPredicate.

test_cases.name: testCompareGreaterOrEqual
test_cases.description: Tests the greater than or equal to comparison functionality of the ComparatorPredicate.

test_cases.name: testCompareLess
test_cases.description: Tests the less than comparison functionality of the ComparatorPredicate.

test_cases.name: testCompareLessOrEqual
test_cases.description: Tests the less than or equal to comparison functionality of the ComparatorPredicate.
